TunableTuple.name: DEFAULT_AUTONOMOUS_WAITING_LINE_PREFERENCE_CURVE
TunableTuple.display: Default Autonomous Waiting Line Preference Curve
TunableTuple.description: A curve that maps the number of sims in a waiting line for this interaction to an autonomy score multiplier for this interaction. This curve is the default curve for any interaction that has not yet been tuned to have its own autonomous_waiting_line_prefence_curve.

Tunable.name: max_y
Tunable.description: The output will be divided by this value. If this is 0, the maximum value tuned on the curve will be used.

Tunable.name: weight
Tunable.description: Value the curve is normalized to as the maximum
